article_node.title: US Jobs Report; DeepSeek To Prep New Model
article_node.summary: Bond and currency traders are braced for the U.S. jobs data, with markets pricing in a Fed rate cut this month. China’s DeepSeek is developing an advanced AI model to compete with U.S. rivals. Oil prices are expected to fall ahead of the OPEC+ meeting, while MTN Group is considering acquiring South Africa’s Telkom.
